summary: This mod requested by nightinglae850 adds a Post Office in Solitude, you can use it to send and receive letters.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34835-1-1367400809.jpg[/img][/center]
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/966622-easy-request] Mod requested by nightinglae850 [/url].
Suggestions are accepted only by the requester.

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34835-3-1367156934.png[/img]

This mod adds a Post Office in Solitude, you can use it to send and receive letters.
To send a letter you must have a friend or more in the Skyrim world (it\'s impossible not to, even if you just started), you need to speak with Janette at the counter and pay 25 gold coins to receive an empty note with which you\'ll be able to interact and send a request to the person you want.
For the letter to reach the person you need to wait 5 minutes In real life and then from 4 to 10 in-game hours, the reply will be avaiable just after.
This mod includes the source code.


[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34835-2-1367156934.png[/img] [list]
[*] Over 210 different letters (all mostly written by Jokerine!);
[*] Two types of letter you can choose from (Reach me and Relationship);
[*] Over 60 different NPCs you can interact with through letters;
[*] [Url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17423]Paintings by Artisanix[/url].
[*] As you spend money, the Post Office will upgrade itself.
[/list]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34835-1-1367159916.png[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34963]Skyrim Character Selector by RhemaTom[/url]:
Allows you to manage multiple character profiles and choose which mods to load with each character, a really must-to-have.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32558]The Seaside Library by Jokerine[/url]:
If you like to know about TES lore or like to read or you\'re just curious to know how the older TES books were like, this mod is really suggested.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33566]Small-Town Merchants by Jokerine[/url]:
Arrived in a small town like Ivarstead planning to sell all the useless loot you gathered so far only to not find any merchant? this mod is for you! It adds merchants which fit perfectly in each town with their own houses.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30046]Better cities by Amblingalong Tsewe TWarrior[/url]:
It will include Better solitude (by TWarrior) with a compatibility patch of this mod, so if you\'re a fan of better cities you won\'t have to give up this mod because it will be supported (Many thanks to TWarrior!).

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34835-1-1367156932.png[/img][list]
[*]nightinglae850:
Mod Requester;
Mod title image.
[/list]
[list]
[*]Jokerine:
130 letters written; 
General mod supporting;
Drawn the banner dividing the various sections.
[/list]
[list]
[*]TWarrior:
Making a compatibility patch of this mod in his \"better solitude\" (In future \"better cities\") mod.
[/list]
author: Xilante
